comment.author: 15828730@N05
comment._content: This looks like a Curtiss XP-40Q Warhawk. Jane's Fighting Aircraft of World War II has a similar photo however it lacks the housing aft of the canopy. The photo on page 221 of that book also shows what appear to be a fourth pair of exhaust stacks. Still the machines are very similar. The only photo of a Curtiss AT-4 I found was online and shows a single seat biplane similar to the P-1.
